result.execSummary:
All charges against Kurt M Hanson in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Kurt M Hanson is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  Defendant to be on house arrest, however may leave home accompanied by sister or person she designates. No alc/cs. Defendant is ordered to have SCRAM unit installed and monitored by Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) - 524 S. Main Street, 3rd floor (262-632-1780.  $208 advanced fee for installment of SCRAM must be paid prior to release from jail. Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

**AMENDED 6-16-2016 $900 OF THE BOND TO BE APPLIED TO ZCI FEES.**

**AMENDED 8-23-2016  No contact with the victim (person, property, residence or family). Defendant is removed from conditions on house arrest. **

Defendant Kurt M Hanson in court with attorney Wendy S. Paul.  Antoinette L. Rich appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Robin Anderson.
St- Will be filing an amended information with the sole count that is left.
Def- Request the bond be amended to a signature bond and have the SCRAM unit removed.

BTC: Bond modified to a $1,000 signature bond. No contact with the victim B.P., no alcohol or drugs, testing is being done through probation.  Jury trial scheduled for January 17, 2017 at 01:30 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for January 13, 2017 at 09:00 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:   Defendant ordered not to possess or control any weapons.  No contact w/victims - PPR&F. No cont w/B.P. Defendant to be on house arrest with GPS monitor through Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI), 524 Main Street, 3rd floor, (262-632-1780). May leave home only for court and appointments w/attorney - and must be accompanied by sister. No alc/cs. Defendant is ordered to have SCRAM unit installed and monitored by Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) - 524 S. Main Street, 3rd floor (262-632-1780.  $208 advanced fee for installment of SCRAM must be paid prior to release from jail. Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Kurt M Hanson in court with attorney Dirk Christian Jensen.  Defendant Kurt M Hanson in custody.  Randall Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Darlene Shue.

House arrest w/GPS - to be monitored by ZCI. May leave home only for court and attorney appointments - and must be w/sister when out of home. SCRAM until to be installed prior to release from jail. Make all court appearances.  Motion hearing scheduled for March 2, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
